item.description:
All who joined us for Christmas dinner LOVED China Pan. There were just too many choices not to return again. I thought it would be nice to open this up to people who weren't able to go on Christmas Day. Border's is next door, so we can walk over afterward.

The menu is huge, and service is great. If you're vegetarian, you may have a difficult time trying to decide what to get. Authentic and extensive menu.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: China Pan - A menu for everyone
